contact.workshop__—Åase: We will drive into your case
contact.workshop__training__program: Individual Simulator.Company training for teams and corporate clients
contact.workshop__description: This is the fastest way to get going with Simulator.Company. We will create an individualized education program based on your needs. As a result, you will have a well-educated team and a working prototype of your business process.
contact.card__description__control: Publish interactive maps to get map services from your own server or laptop.
contact.contactUs__description: We'd love to hear it! We are happy to answer any inquiries related to purchasing, billing, cooperation, as well as any questions and suggestions.

by.questitonDescription: Do you have any questions? We will happily answer them!
by.titleCard1: What is a state change and how do you calculate it?
by.titleCard2: What happens if I consume all the state changes of my pricing plan?
by.titleCard3: Is support included in pricing plans?
by.titleCard4: Do you have a free plan?
by.titleCard6: Can I change my pricing plan?
by.descriptionCard1: A state change happens when a task is transferred from one node to another. A task consumes 3 statechanges going through 4 nodes. Total number of state changes can be expressed as SC = (N - 1) * T, where SC is the number of state changes, N is the number of nodes in a process, and T is the number of tasks received by this process.
by.descriptionCard2: After consuming all state changes of your pricing plan we will limit your speed to 2 tasks per second until payment is made. If the total number of consumed state changes exceeds 120% of your pricing plan, we will block your account until payment is made.
by.descriptionCard3: Yes, all clients receive a Basic free support package. Other support packages can be purchased separately. More details on support page.
by.descriptionCard4: No, but we have a 30-day trial that is given to all users after registration.
by.descriptionCard5: No, we do not provide such a function.
by.descriptionCard6: Yes, you can. You pay for the new pricing package and the old subscription will automatically deactivate while new one launches.
